title: Lambda function for Node.js using TypeScript with ESM and ESBuild configured
description: Create a Lambda function for Node.js with ESM modules configured and ESBuild bundle set up in the CDK configuration

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use ES modules with a Lambda function using TypeScript, ESBuild and CDK.
This template has already the bundle properly configured in CDK to leverage ES modules in Node.js for leveraging dynamic imports or top-level await for instance.
